Today August 7 is #BlackWomensEqualPay – which means in 2018 black woman still have to work about an additional 200 days to make what white men make in a year. 

https://www.forbes.com/sites/shelleyzalis/2018/08/07/closing-the-wage-gap-on-black-womens-equal-pay-day-is-a-win-for-us-all/#1b6993b21013

By the end of their careers, on average Black women will have been paid about $840,000 less than their white male counterparts. That’s money that could have gone into student loans, rent, and groceries. Long past time to close the gap. #BlackWomensEqualPayDay
